typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	partdistFrom as string
}
source(output(
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		ntt_debtoreligibilitystatustypeid as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		statecode as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTDebtorEligibilityStatusTypeId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/debtors/debtoreligibilitystatustype') ~> sourceODS
dcolSQL alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSQL
FilterODS select(mapColumn(
		batch_id = intBatchId,
		isValid = blIsValid,
		createdon = tsCreatedOn,
		modifiedon = tsModifiedOn,
		ntt_debtoreligibilitystatustypeid = strNTTDebtorEligibilityStatusTypeId,
		ntt_name = strNTTName,
		isTruncate = blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectODS
SelectODS derive(ntt_name = coalesce(ntt_name, 'unknown'),
		createdon_dimdate_fk = iif(createdon == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(createdon, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		modifiedon_dimdate_fk = iif(modifiedon == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(modifiedon, 'yyyyMMdd')))) ~> dcolSQL
sourceODS filter(partdist >= toDate($partdistFrom)) ~> FilterODS
AlterRowSQL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ntt_debtoreligibilitystatustypeid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSQL
